question: Which of the following is an insecticide?
explanation:
TNT- a high explosive formed from toluene by substitution of three hydrogen atoms with nitro groups. It is relatively insensitive to shock and can be conveniently melted.
DDT -It was one of the first chemicals in widespread use as a insecticide. Following World War II, it was promoted as a wonder-chemical, the simple solution to pest problems large and small.
Salicylic acid- Salicylic acid is a keratolytic. It belongs to the same class of drugs as aspirin.
Ammonium phosphate- It is a fertilizer.
